mailSubject: Confirmation of Updated Checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to confirm that we have successfully updated the checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC, associated with the LEI ID K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32. The updated checklist details are as follows:

### Updated Checklist Summary:
| Checklist Item                         | Status     | Comment                                                                                          |
|----------------------------------------|------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                  | Validated  | Utility Bill from London City Utilities, valid until 2023-12-31.                                |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Financial details for 2020-2022 provided with Ellipro scores of 80-85.                          |
| Company Bank and Postal Details        | Validated  | GB bank account and postal details available.                                                   |
| Company Directorship                   | Pending    | Directors' verification statuses are pending.                                                   |
| Company Tax Documentation              | Pending    | Multiple documents available but pending review or renewal.                                     |
| Company Regulatory Compliance          | Pending    | Some regulations are compliant while others are under review.                                   |
| Company Business Scope                 | Pending    | Business type, industry code, and operation data are provided but verification is pending.       |
| Company PEP Screening                  | Missing    | No PEP screening data found for the LEI ID.                                                     |
| Company Revenue Details                | Validated  | Revenue data derived from annual accounts for 2020-2022.                                        |
| Company Market Capitalization Details  | Missing    | No market capitalization data available.                                                        |

The updated checklist has been securely documented in JSON format and is available in our GitHub repository. If you require further details or modifications, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for your attention.

Best regards,  
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
